import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import DB_PRODUCTS from "../database/products_db"; import DB_ATTRIBUTES from "../database/attributes_db"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const ProductDetail = (props) => { const id = useParams(); const product = DB_PRODUCTS.filter((product) => Number(product.id) === Number(id.id))[0]; const addToCart = (product) => { props.addToCart(product); } return (
  1. Home
  2. Projects
  3. Flowbite

{DB_ATTRIBUTES.brands.filter((attribute) => Number(attribute.uid) === Number(product.brand))[0].value}

{product.name}

{product.description}

Size
BDT. {product.price}
); } export default ProductDetail;
